scripts.allure:clear: rm -rf allure-results/*;rm -rf allure-results-aggregated-files/*;rm -rf  allure-report/*; rm -rf cypress/screenshots/*; rm -rf  cypress/videos/*
scripts.cypress: npm run allure:clear;npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/test/test.spec.cy.ts --env allure=true;npm run allure:report
